DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluates the responsiveness of 7 functional tasks to botulinum toxin Type A treatment in poststroke patients with spasticity of the upper-limb flexors
DOC.brief_title: Study of Responsiveness of Seven Functional Tasks in Patients With Poststroke Upper Limb Spasticity With Botulinum Toxin Type A Treatment
DOC.criteria: Medically stable poststroke with focal unilateral upperlimb spasticity Stroke within 6 months of the study enrollment visit Previous or current botulinum toxin therapy of any type in the study limb
